item.title: Coding problem
item.dc:creator: @fishypoo101 fishypoo101
item.description:
@fishypoo101 wrote:

hey, i added a ::kill command here’s the code, it has an error but i don’t know what to do.

client.java:9433: ‘else’ without ‘if’
else if (command.startsWith<“gloves”))
^
1 error
there are other codes tell me if im doing the incorrect spacing or anything, im new to coding here’s code:

else if (command.startsWith(“balla”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(1046,1);
addItem(3105,1);
addItem(6107,1);
addItem(6585,1);
addItem(6570,1);
addItem(2497,1);
addItem(6889,1);
addItem(4151,1);
addItem(7462,1);
sendMessage(“Shit now thats balla!!”);
}
else if (command.startsWith(“kill”) && playerRights >= 3) {
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
//int thereHP = p.playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
int thereHP = p.playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
p.ApplyDead();
hitDiff = 999999999;
thereHP -= 999999999;
updateRequired = true;
// PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = +playerName+" has been killed by (yourname)";
sendMessage("You kill "+p.playerName);
}
}
catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“Try entering a name you want to kill…”); }
}
else if (command.startsWith(“gloves”))
{
addItem(7462,1);
addItem(7461,1);
addItem(7460,1);
addItem(7459,1);
addItem(7458,1);
addItem(7457,1);
addItem(2903,2000000000);
addItem(2913,2000000000);
addItem(2923,2000000000);
addItem(2933,2000000000);
addItem(2943,2000000000);
addItem(3800,2000000000);
addItem(4309,2000000000);
addItem(2913,2000000000);
}
